Detailed Description

CGNATViewFactory.

Description: The CGNATViewFactory class is a factory that returns a IGNATView loaded with the filename passed.

Limitations: None

Member Function Documentation

IGNATView * CGNATViewFactory::createGNATView (  PROGRAM_MODE  type,
const QString &  fileName,
QWidget *  parent = 0
)  [static]
 

CGNATViewFactory::createGNATView.

Description: This function creates the given view mode and then loads the given file into it.

Precondition:
None
Postcondition:
If a proper file was given, the corresponding view is created and the file is loaded into that view.
Parameters:
type,: This is the view type to create.
fileName,: This is the name of the file to be loaded.
parent,: This is a pointer to the parent object the new view will go under.
Returns:
IGNATView *: This is a pointer to the newly created view.
Limitations: None

Definition at line 140 of file IGNATView.cpp.

References IGNATView::loadFromFile(), MODE_CHANCE, MODE_PUZZLE, MODE_TREE, and MODE_UNDEFINED.

IGNATView * CGNATViewFactory::createGNATView (  const QString &  fileName,
QWidget *  parent = 0
)  [static]
 

CGNATViewFactory::createGNATView.

Description: This function determines if the given file is a valid GNAT file and determines what view mode the file requires if it is. It then creates the proper view and loads that file into it.

Precondition:
None
Postcondition:
If a proper file was given, the corresponding view is created and the file is loaded into that view.
Parameters:
fileName,: This is the name of the file to be loaded.
parent,: This is a pointer to the parent object the new view will go under.
Returns:
IGNATView *: This is a pointer to the newly created view.
Limitations: None
